means: 好心肠的，仁慈的，同情的

sentence.Network_en: Underneath his rather severe manner, he is really very kindhearted.
sentence.Network_cn: 他待人态度相当严厉, 但心地确实十分善良.

sentence.Network_en: She was a jolly, kindhearted woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是个心地善良、整天乐呵呵的女人。
善良的人们憎恨使用暴力.

when she was a child , she was adopted by a kindhearted couple as their adoptive daughter .从小她被一对好心的夫妇收为义女。

entry.def: If you describe someone as kind-hearted, you mean that they are kind, caring, and generous.

example.ex: He was a warm, generous and kind-hearted man.
example.tran: 他是个热情、大方、善良的人。

means.word_mean: 1. having or proceeding from an innately kind disposition;
好心肠的;仁慈的;同情的

sentences.en: Underneath his rather severe manner,he is really very kindhearted.
sentences.cn: 他待人态度相当严厉,但心地确实十分善良。
